full_summary:
# Operation and Maintenance of Building Systems in Museum Facilities
## Title and Reference Number
- **Title (English):** Operation & Maintenance of Building Systems in Museum Facilities
- **Title (French):** Exploitation et entretien des systèmes de bâtiments dans les installations du Musée
- **Reference Number (English):** PW-23-01028164
- **Reference Number (French):** PW-23-01028164
## Tender Information
- **Tender Status (English):** Expiring
- **Tender Status (French):** Expiré
- **Closing Date and Time:** March 28th 2023, 4:00 PM (16:00)
## Service Categories
- **Main Service Category:** SRV (Services)
## Trading Agreements
- **Canadian Trade Agreements:**
  - Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  - World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  - Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  - Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  - Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
  - Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  - Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  - Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
## Installation Location
- **Location of Installation:** National Capital Region (NCR)
## Contract Information
- **Contracting Entity:** Canadian Museum of Nature
- **Address:** P.O. Box 3443, Station D, Ottawa, ON K1P 6P4, Canada
- **Duration of Contract:** From April 17th, 2023, to April 16th, 2028

Contact Information
- **Contact Person Name (English):** Michelle Garber
- **Contact Person E-mail (English):** approvisionnement-Procurement@nature.ca
- **Contact Person Phone (English):** [Provided by Ext. 2: 1-800-354-8010]
- **Contact Person Address (English):** P.O. Box 3443, Station D, Ottawa, ON K1P 6P4, Canada
- **Regional Address (French):** C.P. 3443, succ
